about_the_game:
Game Overview

**"NINDO -Sentinel in the Shadow of Stars-"** is a deck-building rogue-lite hack-and-slash game set in a Japanese-style world. Face powerful enemies and create unique tactics through repeated choices and growth. Your ninja path will open up the future of Starlight!

Features

Beautiful Japanese-style x anime-style visuals Explore a fascinating world that combines traditional Japanese beauty with a pop anime style. Unique characters and enemies add color to the story.

Fusion of deck building and action Choose new cards for each battle and strengthen your deck! Enjoy strategic battles using ninjutsu, martial arts, and special moves.

High replayability with rogue-lite elements A dungeon with a different development every time. Even if you are defeated, the next challenge will be stronger and more thrilling.

Stories contained in flavor text Through the detailed stories depicted in the backgrounds of cards and items, you can learn about the past and destiny of Starlight's ninjas.

Gameplay

Explore dungeons and battle

Use cards to defeat enemies in battle

Acquire new cards and items to strengthen your deck

Create your own ninja path with NINDO - Guardian of Starlight!

Add it to your wishlist now and don't miss the release!

name: NINDO -Sentinel in the Shadow of Stars-

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
